scripts.build: babel --delete-dir-on-start src -d build && prettier --semi true --trailing-comma none --write build/**/*.js && node --loader ./cdc-initializer/scripts/extensionLoader.js cdc-initializer/build/build.js
scripts.build-feature: babel --delete-dir-on-start src -d build && prettier --semi true --trailing-comma none --write build/**/*.js && node --loader ./cdc-initializer/scripts/extensionLoader.js cdc-initializer/feature/index.js build
scripts.deploy: babel --delete-dir-on-start src -d build && prettier --semi true --trailing-comma none --write build/**/webScreenSets/**/*.js && node cdc-initializer/build/build.js && node cdc-initializer/deploy/deploy.js
scripts.deploy-feature: npm run build-feature && prettier --semi true --trailing-comma none --write build/**/webScreenSets/**/*.js && node --loader ./cdc-initializer/scripts/extensionLoader.js cdc-initializer/feature/index.js deploy
scripts.start: babel --delete-dir-on-start src -d build && prettier --semi true --trailing-comma none --write build/**/webScreenSets/**/*.js && node cdc-initializer/build/build.js && light-server -c .lightserverrc
